body:
Why cant we just have the MCZone spawn? I think its much better than the current one!

Maybe not by the look, but the MCZone spawn is old ik, but it's a memory for the Avicus players!!

replies.body:
Forward...

Any new player that comes on and sees the hub won't really be impressed, it's outdated, it's too minimalistic to be a hub, it's uglier compared to the current hub and any new minecrafter and their 9 year old sibling can make this hub.

You wouldn't be talking about it if it were newer.
